test.description: Test glyph selection using altGlyphDef and altGlyphItem elements.

test.title: text-altglyph-03-b
test.description: Test glyph selection using altGlyphDef and altGlyphItem elements.

test.title: text-bidi-01-t
test.description: Test directional type, ltr context, arabic. Assertion: In a left-to-right context, without markup, styling or special characters, a sequence of Arabic characters and spaces will progress from right to left.

test.title: text-deco-01-b
test.comment: Decoration is not supported in SVG fonts yet.
test.description: Test the 'text-decoration' property.

test.title: text-dom-01-f
test.description: This tests the methods and properties of the SVGTextContentElement interface on the text element with the id 'testText' and the content 'This is a test of the interface SVGTextContentElement'. The word 'is' has two glyphs with different rotation values defined with a <tspan/> element. There are 12 subtests testing the 9 methods and 2 properties. Note that the numeric results of some methods may vary. The additional instructions state where the result may vary and where it should have an exact value.

test.title: text-dom-02-f
test.description: This tests that methods on the SVGTextContentElement interface that take an index to a character or a number of characters actually interpret these as indexes to or numbers of UTF-16 code units. To test this, a character from outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (U+10000; LINEAR B SYLLABLE B008) is used in a text string. This character is stored in UTF-16 as a surrogate pair.

test.title: text-dom-03-f
test.description: This tests that SVGTextContentElement.getSubStringLength() handles out-of-range charnum and nchars parameter values correctly.

test.title: text-dom-04-f
test.description: This tests the SVGTextContentElement.getSubStringLength method.

test.title: text-dom-05-f
test.description: This tests that methods on the SVGTextContentElement interface that take an index to a character or a number of characters actually interpret these as indexes to or numbers of UTF-16 code units. To test this, a character from outside the Basic Multilingual Plane (U+10000; LINEAR B SYLLABLE B008) is used in a text string. This character is stored in UTF-16 as a surrogate pair.

test.title: text-fonts-01-t
test.description: Purpose of test is to determine if the font family is being correctly selected. The top two lines of text test serif fonts; the top line in maroon tests the generic font family 'serif' and the second line in black tests a selection of commonly available named serif fonts. The next two lines of text test sans-serif fonts; the top line in maroon tests the generic font family 'sans-serif' and the second line in black tests a selection of commonly available named sans serif fonts. The following two lines of text test monospaced fonts; the top line in maroon tests the generic font family 'monospaced' and the second line in black tests a selection of commonly available named monospaced fonts. The lowercase 'i' and uppercase'W' should be the same width,for monospaced fonts.

test.title: text-fonts-02-t
test.description: Purpose of test is to determine if the font weight is being correctly rendered. A number of font families are specified. The numerical weight values (100 to 900) should show the lighter weights on the lower numbers and the heavier weights on the larger numbers. Heavier is defined to mean 'no lighter'.

test.title: text-fonts-03-t
test.description: Testing font-family attribute. Two SVG fonts are defined. Various text elements are then used with varying values for the font-family attribute.

test.title: text-fonts-04-t
test.description: Testing font-family attribute. Various text elements are used with varying values for the font-family attribute.

test.title: text-fonts-05-f
test.description: Test that the 'line-height' property has no effect on text layout.

test.title: text-fonts-202-t
test.description: This tests the 'font-weight' property when multiple weights are available. A font family with six weights is specified, with a fallback to 'serif'.

test.title: text-fonts-203-t
test.description: This tests the 'font-weight' property when multiple weights are available. A font family with five weights is specified, with a fallback to 'serif'.

test.title: text-fonts-204-t
test.description: This tests the 'font-weight' property when multiple weights are available. A font family with five weights is specified, with a fallback to 'serif'.

test.title: text-intro-01-t
test.description: Test left-to-right aspect of internationalized text.

test.title: text-intro-02-b
test.description: Test various aspects of internationalized text, including left-to-right, right-to-left, and the following properties: 'writing-mode', 'direction' and 'unicode-bidi'.

test.title: text-intro-03-b
test.description: Test top-to-bottom internationalized text and the following properties: 'writing-mode', 'glyph-orientation-vertical', 'glyph-orientation-horizontal'.

test.title: text-intro-04-t
test.description: Test basic aspect of internationalized text.

test.title: text-intro-05-t
test.description: Tests Arabic text using various platform fonts. If these fonts are not available, a fallback font should be used that has Arabic glyphs. If such a font is not available, the 'missing glyph' (typically an open rectangle) should be displayed. It is an error to display the wrong Arabic glyphs, for example to display all isolate forms.

test.title: text-intro-06-t
test.description: This test ensures that mandatory ligatures in Arabic are displayed. This test uses WOFF fonts for rendering, with platform fonts for fallback.

test.title: text-intro-07-t
test.description: This test ensures that mandatory ligatures in Arabic are displayed.

test.title: text-intro-09-b
test.description: Test various aspects of internationalized text, including left-to-right, right-to-left, and the following properties: 'writing-mode', 'direction' and 'unicode-bidi'.

test.title: text-intro-10-f
test.description: Tests Arabic text using various platform fonts. If these fonts are not available, a fallback font should be used that has Arabic glyphs. If such a font is not available, the 'missing glyph' (typically an open rectangle) should be displayed. It is an error to display the wrong Arabic glyphs, for example to display all isolate forms.

test.title: text-intro-11-t
test.description: This test ensures that mandatory ligatures in Arabic are displayed. Three values for text-anchor are also tested; middle, start and end. This test uses platform fonts for rendering.

test.title: text-intro-12-t
test.description: This test ensures that mandatory ligatures in Arabic are displayed. This test uses downloaded WOFF fonts for rendering.

test.title: text-path-01-b
test.description: Test textPath element in combination with the tspan element. Properties of the text on a path are changed using the tspan element.

test.title: text-path-02-b
test.description: This tests the 'textPath/startOffset' with both negative and positive values, and compares it to the case where a 'tspan/dx' attribute is used with the same values.

test.title: text-spacing-01-b
test.description: Test properties 'letter-spacing' and 'word-spacing'

test.title: text-text-01-b
test.description: Test viewer capibility to handle basic use of 'textLength' and 'lengthAdjust' attributes.

test.title: text-text-03-b
test.description: Test text element, tspan element and various text decorations

test.title: text-text-04-t
test.description: The purpose of this test is to validate proper handling of the text element's x and y attributes. In the various samples, a orange marker shows the text's (0,0) coordinate. The blue markers show the current text positions. These are either defined by absolute x/y positioning or they are computed from the embeded font's glyphs advances.

test.title: text-text-05-t
test.description: The purpose of this test is to validate the interaction of text-anchor and x/y glyph positioning.

test.title: text-text-06-t
test.description: The purpose of this test is to validate the interaction of x/y glyph positioning and ligatures.

test.title: text-text-07-t
test.description: Tests multiple x, y, rotate, with various combinations. Since an array of values is given, each glyph must use the value from the corresponding character in the list.

test.title: text-text-08-b
test.description: The three opacity properties (fill-opacity, stroke-opacity, and opacity) of 'text' elements are covered in this test.

test.title: text-text-09-t
test.description: Tests multiple x, y, rotate, with various combinations. Since an array of values is given, each glyph must use the value from the corresponding character in the list. In this test, there are less values in the array than there are characters.

test.title: text-text-10-t
test.description: Test rendering of text rotated by a transform attribute.

test.title: text-text-11-t
test.description: Test rendering of text rotated by a transform attribute, same as the text-text-10-t test but not using an SVGFont.

test.title: text-text-12-t
test.description: ISSUE: the glyphs don't cover the entire em-cell, and the spec doesn't require visual alignment - text adjustments are based on advances

test.title: text-tref-01-b
test.description: Test viewer capability to handle a basic 'tref' element which points to a text string in an external file.

test.title: text-tref-02-b
test.description: Test viewer capability to handle 'tref' elements which point to text strings outside the current SVG document fragment.

test.title: text-tref-03-b
test.description: Test viewer capability to handle 'tref' elements which point to elements that have children. The flattened text content is to be used.

test.title: text-tselect-01-b
test.description: Test text selection.

test.title: text-tselect-02-f
test.description: This test demonstrates text selection of bidirectional text.

test.title: text-tselect-03-f
test.description: This test demonstrates text selection of bidirectional text.

test.title: text-tspan-01-b
test.description: Test tspan element styling and relative position adjustments.

test.title: text-tspan-02-b
test.description: Tests the rotate attribute in the tspan element.

test.title: text-ws-01-t
test.description: Test for viewer correct handling of whitespace and the 'xml:space' attribute. There are two sub-tests, for xml:space value "default". In each test, the content of the 'text' element is written on multiple lines. The first test of each pair has indented text with leading space characters, tabs, etc. The second has no indentation, but a line break before the content and after it. There are no space (or other whitespace) characters at the ends of the lines.

test.title: text-ws-02-t
test.description: Test for viewer correct handling of whitespace and the 'xml:space' attribute. There are two sub-tests, for value "preserve". In each test, the content of the 'text' element is written on multiple lines. The first test of each pair has indented text with leading space characters, tabs, etc. The second has no indentation, but a line break before the content and after it. There are no space (or other whitespace) characters at the ends of the lines.

test.title: text-ws-03-t
test.description: This tests that an 'xml:space' attribute on a text element child will be honored.

test.title: types-basic-01-f
test.description: Tests scientific notation in attribute values; in particular, that numbers of the form .n with a leading decimal point, are supported

test.title: types-basic-02-f
test.description: Tests units and no units on <length> in CSS on a property defined in the SVG specification.

test.title: types-dom-01-b
test.description: This test checks all the methods and properties of the SVGLocatable interface. Note the use of nested svg elements and testing against different elements in the hierarchy. Note that the values of .getScreenCTM() and .getCTM() can only be tested correctly if they are in the html-based test or the width and height of the root element is explicitly set to 480x360. The methods .getScreenCTM() and .getCTM() are tested from the rotated text element, the method .getBBox(), .getTransformToElement() is tested between the rotated text and its parent group, the method .getBBox() and the properties .farthestViewportElement and .nearestViewportElement are tested on the blue circle.

test.title: types-dom-02-f
test.description: This tests that the animVal properties that are objects are always distinct from their corresponding baseVal properties. This is tested for interfaces SVGAnimatedNumberList, SVGAnimatedLength, SVGAnimatedLengthList, SVGAnimatedAngle, SVGAnimatedRect, SVGAnimatedTransformList and SVGAnimatedPreserveAspectRatio.

test.title: types-dom-03-b
test.description: Test that bounding box geometry can be obtained before the SVGLoad event is dispatched.

test.title: types-dom-04-b
test.description: This tests that SVG DOM objects that correspond to attributes are live. This is tested for interfaces SVGAnimatedNumberList, SVGAnimatedLength, SVGAnimatedLengthList, SVGAnimatedAngle, SVGAnimatedRect, SVGAnimatedTransformList, SVGAnimatedPreserveAspectRatio, SVGAnimatedBoolean, SVGAnimatedString, SVGAnimatedEnumeration, SVGAnimatedInteger and SVGAnimatedNumber.

test.title: types-dom-05-b
test.description: This tests that assigning a valid length or angle string to valueAsString on an SVGLength or SVGAngle will affect that object's unitType, and that assigning an invalid string will throw a DOMException with code SYNTAX_ERR.

test.title: types-dom-06-f
test.description: This tests parts of the SVGStringList interface. Particularly it tests that strings that are taken from one SVGStringList and then inserted into another SVGStringList duplicates the value instead of removing the value from the first list when it's inserted into the second list.

test.title: types-dom-07-f
test.description: This tests that the contents of an animVal object are read only. This is tested for interfaces SVGAnimatedNumberList, SVGAnimatedLength, SVGAnimatedLengthList, SVGAnimatedAngle, SVGAnimatedRect, SVGAnimatedTransformList and SVGAnimatedPreserveAspectRatio.

test.title: types-dom-08-f
test.description: This test draws a few basic shapes and checks for correct values from getBBox().

test.title: types-dom-svgfittoviewbox-01-f
test.description: Retrieving the 'viewBox' and 'preserveAspectRatio' attributes of the 'SVGFitToViewBox' interface is supported.

test.title: types-dom-svglengthlist-01-f
test.description: The 'getItem', 'replaceItem', and 'removeItem' operations of the 'SVGLengthList' interface raise the 'INDEX_SIZE_ERR' exception when the specified index number is greater than the number of items in the list.

test.title: types-dom-svgnumberlist-01-f
test.description: The 'getItem', 'replaceItem', and 'removeItem' operations of the 'SVGNumberList' interface raise the 'INDEX_SIZE_ERR' exception when the specified index number is greater than the number of items in the list.

test.title: types-dom-svgstringlist-01-f
test.description: The 'getItem', 'replaceItem', and 'removeItem' operations of the 'SVGStringList' interface raise the 'INDEX_SIZE_ERR' exception when the specified index number is greater than the number of items in the list.

test.title: types-dom-svgtransformable-01-f
test.description: Retrieving and setting the 'transform' attribute of the 'SVGTransformable' interface is supported.

test.title: conform-viewers-01-t
test.description: Test that the viewer can read gzipped content.

test.title: conform-viewers-02-f
test.description: Test that the viewer can read gzipped content in data uri.

test.title: conform-viewers-03-f
test.description: This test checks that namespace prefixes are handled correctly.

test.title: extend-namespace-01-f
test.description: Test mixing a business data namespace with elements in SVG namespace.

test.title: imp-path-01-f
test.description: Tests that markers are drawn on zero-length 'path' and 'line' segments.

test.title: metadata-example-01-t
test.description: Check that metadata in a variety of namespaces, inside a metadata element, does not affect rendering in any way. The file is not valid to the SVG 1.1 DTD, but is well formed.

test.title: svgdom-over-01-f
test.description: This tests how unspecified attributes affect the return values from the SVG DOM methods related to attributes.
